author: danielsh
msg: Make the tests harness copy the FAIL and XPASS logs to a separate file, for
(TestHarness.run):  Create and fill FAILLOGFILE with FAIL and XPASS logs.
Pass 'fails.log' as a sibling of 'tests.log' to the test harness.

msg: Add a link to the auto-generated JavaHL docs.

author: nick
msg: When building ISO8601 dates, ensure we're always working in UTC (for TIKA-451)
